text: Sheng Thao (born July 18, 1985) is an American politician. She was the 51st Mayor of Oakland, California from 2023 until 2024. She was the first Hmong- American mayor of a major city in the United States. On November 5, 2024, there was an election to remove her from office. The people of Oakland voted to remove her as mayor. She left office on December 17. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Oakland, California Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Stockton, California
title: Sheng Thao
